# Load dependencies and source data

```{r load_data, message=FALSE}

library(Matrix)
library(scran)
library(BiocParallel)
library(BiocNeighbors)
ncores = 20
mcparam = MulticoreParam(workers = ncores)
register(mcparam)
library(igraph)
library(reshape2)
library(knitr)
library(scater)
library(scales)
library(biomaRt)
library(batchelor)
library(irlba)
library(batchelor)
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)

#root.dir = "/Users/alsu/Develop/spatial/mouse_embryo/"
root.dir = "/nfs/research1/marioni/alsu/spatial/mouse_embryo/"
source(paste0(root.dir, "amScripts_mouseEmbryoFISH/core_functions.R"))

load_embryo_8.5(dir = "cluster")
sce.seq = sce[!rownames(sce) == "Xist",]

# add batching w z
sce.seq$embryo_pos_z = paste0(sce.seq$embryo_pos, "_", sce.seq$z)
sce.seq$embryo_z = paste0(sce.seq$embryo, "_", sce.seq$z)
meta$embryo_pos_z = paste0(meta$embryo_pos, "_", meta$z)
meta$embryo_z = paste0(meta$embryo, "_", meta$z)

# !!!! update when Shila adds log by total area
# add lognorm by area and cosineNorm by area
# add log normalized by area
getAreaFactorsDirectly = function(sce, transform = NULL) {
  # sce is a SingleCellExperiment object
  # transform is a function
  meta = colData(sce)
  counts = assay(sce, "counts")
  if (!is.null(transform)) {
    sizeFactors.area <- transform(meta$Area)/mean(transform(meta$Area))
  } else {
    sizeFactors.area <- meta$Area/mean(meta$Area)
  }
  logcounts.area <- log2(t(t(counts)/sizeFactors.area) + 1)
  return(list(sizeFactors = sizeFactors.area,
              logcounts.area = logcounts.area))
}
out_area = getAreaFactorsDirectly(sce.seq)
assay(sce.seq, "logcounts.area") <- out_area[["logcounts.area"]]
assay(sce.seq, "cosineNorm.area") <- cosineNorm(assay(sce.seq, "logcounts.area"))


# load atlas 
sce.atlas = readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "data/reducedAtlas/E8_25__E8_5.rds"))
sce.atlas = sce.atlas[rownames(sce.seq), ]

# order seq and atlas (in case, cant hurt, had troubles b4)
sce.seq = sce.seq[order(rownames(sce.seq)),]
sce.atlas = sce.atlas[order(rownames(sce.atlas)),]

# join
sce.joint = cbind(assay(sce.seq, "cosineNorm.area"), assay(sce.atlas, "cosineNorm"))
batchFactor = factor(c(as.character(sce.seq$embryo_pos_z), as.character(sce.atlas$sample)))


```

# Seq

## Get closest cell

```{r seq-closest-cell, message=FALSE}

nPC = 50
genes = rownames(sce.seq)

closestCell.seq = bplapply(genes, function(current.gene){
  current.sce.joint = sce.joint[!rownames(sce.joint) == current.gene, ]
  mbpca = multiBatchPCA(current.sce.joint, batch = batchFactor, d = nPC)
  out = do.call(reducedMNN, mbpca)
  joint.pca = out$corrected
  current.knns = queryKNN( joint.pca[colnames(sce.atlas),], joint.pca[colnames(sce.seq),], k = 1, 
                           get.index = TRUE, get.distance = FALSE)
  cells.mapped = t(apply(current.knns$index, 1, function(x) colnames(sce.atlas)[x]))
  colnames(cells.mapped) = colnames(sce.seq)
  return(cells.mapped)
  saveRDS(closestCell.seq, file =  paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/nn_1/closest_cell_seq2atlas_", current.gene, ".rds"))
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)

closestCell.seq = do.call(rbind, closestCell.seq )
rownames(closestCell.seq) = genes

saveRDS(closestCell.seq, file =  paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/nn_1/closest_cell_seq2atlas.rds"))


```

## Get imputed logcounts from atlas

```{r seq-imputed-logcounts, message=FALSE}

counts.atlas = logcounts(sce.atlas)

logcounts.imputed.seq = lapply(genes, function(current.gene){
  current.closestCell = closestCell.seq[current.gene,]
  current.imputed = sapply(1:length(current.closestCell), function(x){
    return(counts.atlas[current.gene, current.closestCell[x]])
  })
  return(current.imputed)
})
logcounts.imputed.seq = do.call(rbind, logcounts.imputed.seq)
rownames(logcounts.imputed.seq) = genes
colnames(logcounts.imputed.seq) = colnames(closestCell.seq)
saveRDS(logcounts.imputed.seq, file =  paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/nn_1/imputed_logcounts_seq2atlas.rds"))

```


## Corr: imputed VS real

```{r seq-corr, message=FALSE}

counts.seq = assay(sce.seq, "logcounts.area")

stat.seq = bplapply(genes, function(current.gene){
  current.closestCell = closestCell.seq[current.gene,]
  
  # real
  current.real = sapply(1:length(current.closestCell), function(x){
    return(counts.seq[current.gene, names(current.closestCell)[x]])
  })
  current.real = data.frame(uniqueID = names(current.closestCell), logcounts.real = current.real)
  
  #imputed
  current.imputed = sapply(1:length(current.closestCell), function(x){
    return(counts.atlas[current.gene, current.closestCell[x]])
  })
  current.imputed = data.frame(uniqueID = names(current.closestCell), logcounts.imputed = current.imputed)
  # joint
  current.joint = merge(current.real, current.imputed)
  current.joint = merge(current.joint, meta)
  
  stat.all = current.joint %>% group_by(embryo_z) %>%
    summarise(corr = cor(logcounts.real, logcounts.imputed, method = "pearson"), 
              mean.sm = mean(logcounts.real))
  stat.CT = current.joint %>% group_by(embryo_z, celltype_mapped) %>%
    summarise(corr = cor(logcounts.real, logcounts.imputed, method = "pearson"), 
              mean.sm = mean(logcounts.real))
  stat = list(stat.all = stat.all, stat.CT = stat.CT)
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)
names(stat.seq) = genes
saveRDS(stat.seq, file =  paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/nn_1/stat_corr_seq2atlas.rds"))


```
